title: StyleDerive
content:

name: StyleDerive
type: class
memorycategory: Gui
summary: |
  When parented to a Class.StyleSheet, references another Class.StyleSheet
  from which the parent inherits Class.StyleRule|StyleRules and token
  definitions.
description: |
  When parented to a Class.StyleSheet, references another Class.StyleSheet
  from which the parent inherits Class.StyleRule|StyleRules and token
  definitions. Multiple StyleDerive instances can exist under a
  Class.StyleSheet and you can order them by
  Class.StyleDerive.Priority|Priority.
codesamples: []
inherits:
  - Instance
descendants: []
tags: []
deprecationmessage: ''
properties:
  - name: StyleDerive.Priority
    summary: |
      A number that determines how style properties inherited through this
      StyleDerive apply relative to the same properties inherited through
      other StyleDerives.
    description: |
      A number that determines how style properties inherited through this
      StyleDerive apply relative to the same properties inherited through
      other StyleDerives. Higher priority takes precedence over lower; for
      example, if a StyleDerive with a priority of 10 points to a sheet
      StyleSheetA, its Class.StyleRule|StyleRules and tokens will take
      precedence over the same Class.StyleRule|StyleRules and tokens inherited
      through lower-priority StyleDerives.
    codesamples: []
    type: int
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Data
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - UI
  - name: StyleDerive.StyleSheet
    summary: |
      The Class.StyleSheet from which the parent Class.StyleSheet inherits
      Class.StyleRule|StyleRules and token definitions.
    description: |
      The Class.StyleSheet from which the parent Class.StyleSheet inherits
      Class.StyleRule|StyleRules and token definitions.
